dict.string: Today is 36 days, which are five weeks and one day, of the Omer.
Hoy es treinta y seis días, que son cinco semanas y un día del Omer.
Aujourd'hui est trente-six jours, qui sont cinq semaines et un jour du Omer
СЕГОДНЯ ТРИДЦАТЬ ШЕСТЬ ДНЕЙ - ЧТО СОСТАВЛЯЕТ ПЯТЬ НЕДЕЛЬ И ОДИН ДЕНЬ - ОМЕРА.
הַיּוֹם שִׁשָּׁה וּשְׁלֹשִׁים יוֹם שֶׁהֵם חֲמִשָּׁה שָׁבוּעוֹת וְיוֹם אֶחָד לָעֽוֹמֶר

ХЕСЕД ШЕБЕ-ЙЕСОЙД
חֶֽסֶד שֶׁבִּיסוֹד
Chesed of Yesod
Lovingkindness in Bonding

Love is the heart of bonding. You cannot bond without love. Love establishes a reliable base on which bonding can build.
If you have a problem bonding, examine how much you love the one (or the experience) with which you wish to bond.
Your Concentration and Focused Attention
Rabbi Simon Jacobson discusses why focused attention is a better gift than any trip or toy you could buy your child.
https://youtu.be/tBcR5PVMWG0
Demonstrate the bond you have with your child or friend through an act of love.
Do I try to bond without first fostering a loving attitude?
If you have a problem bonding, examine how much you love the one (or the experience) with which you wish to bond
Is my bonding expressed in a loving manner?
